QuestData.Title: Boss' Revenge
QuestData.Description:
Revenge has never really been my thing, but whatever is in there killed my crew and I am not going to let it stand.
Everybody fights, nobody quits.
QuestData.RewardText: To survive out here, we do what we have to. Today that meant avenging members of the pack.$B$BThank you for your help. If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to call on the Roughnecks.
